definitions.definition: To put on the throne in a formal installation ceremony called enthronement , equivalent to (and often combined with) coronation and/or other ceremonies of investiture .
To help a candidate to the succession of a monarchy (as a kingmaker does), or by extension in any other major organisation.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To put on the throne in a formal installation ceremony called enthronement , equivalent to (and often combined with) coronation and/or other ceremonies of investiture .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , figuratively ) To help a candidate to the succession of a monarchy (as a kingmaker does), or by extension in any other major organisation.
